description:
Hello and welcome to Modern Facebook Marketing: 3 Epic Keys To The Ultimate Reach.  In  this course, we'll learn how to create an undeniable reach with your audience.  We'll explore the Facebook platform & what it can do for your small business. 

What We'll Do

  • Learn how to Generating Revenue
    • Revenue on the local level
    • Revenue from online sales 
  • Learn how to Generate Brand Awareness. 
  • Learn how to Promote an App
  • Learn how to setup a Dynamic Facebook Business Page
    • Live Interactive Tutorial (together)

This course was designed for anyone looking to take their Facebook page to the next level through the education of the most important and most overlooked facebook fundamentals.  After taking this course, you will have a better understanding of the significant reach you possess with facebook.  In turn, you will be able to implement that understanding to start yielding results immediately.
title: Modern Facebook Marketing: 3 Epic Keys To The Ultimate Reach
